name: Green Path Foundation

address: Vivekananda Road, Jubilee Mant Room no - 4

briefDescription: Initially with the blessing of some monk of ‘Belur Math’ and local eminent persons, the Green Path Foundation has come into existence has since been consistently serving to the cause of waste management. It is unstinted faith in the impact of waste material on individual as well as social regeneration leading to the total good of human Community. It is high time that it undergoes an innovative and orientate dimension to meet the crying needs of the society. It is the primordial factor for the total uplift of a society along with the food and shelter, health and hygiene, we need space and vast natural surroundings and unabatedly in a free and fresh atmosphere, we also trust on concerted efforts towards global warming also.
